token.description: Waypoint token to authenticate to Waypoint server

claim_mappings.description: Mapping of a claim to a variable value for the access selector

discovery_ca_pem.description: Optional CA certificate chain to validate the discovery URL. Multiple CA certificates can be specified to support easier rotation

display_name.description: Friendly display name of OIDC auth method

list_claim_mappings.description: Same as claim-mapping but for list values

signing_algs.description: The signing algorithms supported by the OIDC connect server. If this isn't specified, this will default to RS256 since that should be supported according to the RFC. The string values here should be valid OIDC signing algorithms

block.description: Auth method OIDC resource manages OIDC auth methods in Waypoint.

app_status_poll_seconds.description: Application status poll interval in seconds

project_name.description: The name of the Waypoint project

project_variables.description: List of variables in Key/value pairs associated with the Waypoint Project

file_change_signal.description: Indicates signal to be sent to any applications when their config files change.

git_path.description: Path in git repository when waypoint.hcl file is stored in a sub-directory

git_poll_interval_seconds.description: Interval at which Waypoint should poll git repository for changes

git_ref.description: Git repository ref containing waypoint.hcl file

git_url.description: Url of git repository storing the waypoint.hcl file

ignore_changes_outside_path.description: Whether Waypoint ignores changes outside path storing waypoint.hcl file

block.description: Configuration of Git repository where waypoint.hcl file is stored
Basic authentication details for Git consisting of `username` and `password`

git_user.description: Git user associated with private key

passphrase.description: Passphrase to use with private key

ssh_private_key.description: Private key to authenticate to Git

block.description: Project resource in the Waypoint Terraform provider.

default.description: Indicates if this runner profile is the default for any new projects

environment_variables.description: Any env vars that should be exposed to the on demand runner.

oci_url.description: oci_url is the OCI image that will be used to boot the on demand runner.

plugin_config.description: plugin config is the configuration for the plugin that is created. It is usually HCL and is decoded like the other plugins, and is plugin specific.

plugin_config_format.description: config format specifies the format of plugin_config.

plugin_type.description: Plugin type for runner i.e docker / kubernetes / aws-ecs.

profile_name.description: The name of the runner profile

target_runner_id.description: The ID of the target runner for this profile.

target_runner_labels.description: A map of labels on target runners

block.description: Runner profile resource to configure Waypoint runners.

app_status_poll_seconds.description: Application status poll interval in seconds

applications.description: Applications associated with the Waypoint project

data_source_git.description: Configuration of Git repository where waypoint.hcl file is stored

project_name.description: The name of the Waypoint project

project_variables.description: List of variables in Key/value pairs associated with the Waypoint Project

remote_runners_enabled.description: Remote runners enabled for the project

block.description: A data source to read project configuration

default.description: Indicates if this runner profile is the default for any new projects

environment_variables.description: Any env vars that should be exposed to the on demand runner.

oci_url.description: oci_url is the OCI image that will be used to boot the on demand runner.

plugin_config.description: plugin config is the configuration for the plugin that is created. It is usually HCL and is decoded like the other plugins, and is plugin specific.

plugin_config_format.description: config format specifies the format of plugin_config.

plugin_type.description: Plugin type for runner i.e docker / kubernetes / aws-ecs.

profile_name.description: The name of the runner profile

target_runner_id.description: The ID of the target runner for this profile.

target_runner_labels.description: A map of labels on target runners

block.description: A data source to read waypoint runner profiles
